installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
shopt -s extglob
set -euo pipefail

: "${SERVER_DIR:=/mnt/server}"
: "${TMP:=/mnt/server/tmp}"
: "${MODPACK_NAME:=}"
: "${MODPACK_ID:=}"
if [[ -z "$MODPACK_NAME" && -z "$MODPACK_ID" ]]; then
  echo "ERROR: MODPACK_NAME or MODPACK_ID must be set."
  exit 1
fi
: "${VERSION_ID:=}"
: "${API_KEY:?Missing API_KEY}"
: "${MOD_DOWNLOAD_THREADS:=4}"
CF_GAME_ID=432
CF_CLASS_ID=4471
CF_BASE_URL="https://api.curseforge.com/v1"

rm -rf "${SERVER_DIR:?}"/* && cd "$SERVER_DIR"

mkdir -p "$SERVER_DIR/logs"
LOG_FILE="$SERVER_DIR/logs/install_$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S).log"
exec > >(tee -a "$LOG_FILE") 2>&1
echo "Logging to $LOG_FILE"

JVM_ARGS_FILE="$SERVER_DIR/user_jvm_args.txt"
declare -a RECOMMENDED_FLAGS=(
  "-Xms4G"
  "-Xmx4G"
  "-XX:+UseG1GC"
  "-XX:MaxGCPauseMillis=100"
  "-XX:+UseStringDeduplication"
  "-Dfile.encoding=UTF-8"
)

if [[ ! -f "$JVM_ARGS_FILE" ]]; then
  echo "Creating new user_jvm_args.txt with recommended JVM flags."
  for flag in "${RECOMMENDED_FLAGS[@]}"; do
    echo "$flag"
  done > "$JVM_ARGS_FILE"
else
  echo "user_jvm_args.txt already exists; ensuring all recommended flags are present."
  for flag in "${RECOMMENDED_FLAGS[@]}"; do
    if ! grep -qxF "$flag" "$JVM_ARGS_FILE"; then
      echo "  â†’ Adding missing flag: $flag"
      echo "$flag" >> "$JVM_ARGS_FILE"
    fi
  done
fi

GET_MODPACK_ID() {
  [[ -n "$MODPACK_ID" ]] && return
  if [[ -z "$MODPACK_NAME" ]]; then
    echo "ERROR: MODPACK_ID not set and MODPACK_NAME is empty."
    exit 1
  fi
  PACK_SLUG=$(echo "$MODPACK_NAME" | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]' | sed 's/ /-/g; s/[^a-z0-9-]//g')
  MODPACK_ID=$(curl -fsSL -H "x-api-key: $API_KEY" \
    "$CF_BASE_URL/mods/search?gameId=$CF_GAME_ID&classId=$CF_CLASS_ID&PACK_SLUG=$PACK_SLUG" \
    | jq -r '.data[0].id')
  [[ -n "$MODPACK_ID" && "$MODPACK_ID" != "null" ]] && return

  ENCODED_NAME=$(jq -sRr @uri <<< "$MODPACK_NAME")
  for ((i=0; ; i+=50)); do
    SEARCH_RESULT=$(curl -fsSL -H "x-api-key: $API_KEY" \
      "$CF_BASE_URL/mods/search?gameId=$CF_GAME_ID&classId=$CF_CLASS_ID&searchFilter=$ENCODED_NAME&sortField=TotalDownloads&sortOrder=desc&index=$i&pageSize=50")
    MODPACK_ID=$(jq -r --arg n "$MODPACK_NAME" \
      '.data[] | select(.name == $n) | .id' <<< "$SEARCH_RESULT" | head -n1)
    [[ -n "$MODPACK_ID" && "$MODPACK_ID" != "null" ]] && return
    (( $(jq '.data | length' <<< "$SEARCH_RESULT") < 50 )) && break
  done

  echo "MODPACK NOT FOUND." && exit 1
}

GET_DOWNLOAD() {
  PACK_DATA=$(curl -fsSL -H "x-api-key: $API_KEY" "$CF_BASE_URL/mods/$MODPACK_ID")
  [[ -z "$VERSION_ID" || "$VERSION_ID" == "latest" ]] && \
    VERSION_ID=$(jq -r '.data.mainFileId' <<< "$PACK_DATA")

  FILE_DATA=$(curl -fsSL -H "x-api-key: $API_KEY" \
    "$CF_BASE_URL/mods/$MODPACK_ID/files/$VERSION_ID")
  if [[ $(jq -r '.data.isServerPack' <<< "$FILE_DATA") == "false" ]]; then
    VERSION_ID=$(jq -r '.data.serverPackFileId // empty' <<< "$FILE_DATA")
  fi

  download_DOWNLOAD_URL=$(curl -fsSL -H "x-api-key: $API_KEY" \
    "$CF_BASE_URL/mods/$MODPACK_ID/files/$VERSION_ID/download-url" \
    | jq -r '.data')
  curl -sSL "$download_url" -o "$SERVER_DIR/server.zip"
}

GET_LOADER() {
  FILE_INFO=$(curl -fsSL -H "x-api-key: $API_KEY" \
    "$CF_BASE_URL/mods/$MODPACK_ID/files/$VERSION_ID")
  if [[ $(jq -r '.data.isServerPack' <<< "$FILE_INFO") == "true" ]]; then
    VERSION_ID=$(jq -r '.data.parentProjectFileId // empty' <<< "$FILE_INFO")
  fi

  CLIENT_URL=$(curl -fsSL -H "x-api-key: $API_KEY" \
    "$CF_BASE_URL/mods/$MODPACK_ID/files/$VERSION_ID/download-url" \
    | jq -r '.data')
  curl -sSL "$CLIENT_URL" -o client.zip

  unzip -jo client.zip manifest.json -d "$SERVER_DIR"
  rm client.zip
  mv "$SERVER_DIR/manifest.json" "$SERVER_DIR/client.manifest.json"

  MANIFEST_FILE="$SERVER_DIR/client.manifest.json"
  LOADER_ID=$(jq -r '.minecraft.modLoaders[] | select(.primary==true) | .id' "$MANIFEST_FILE")
  LOADER_NAME="${LOADER_ID%%-*}"
  LOADER_VERSION="${LOADER_ID#*-}"
  MINECRAFT_VERSION=$(jq -r '.minecraft.version' "$MANIFEST_FILE")
}

GET_JAVA() {
  shopt -s extglob
  case "$MINECRAFT_VERSION" in
    1.@(8|9|10|11)*) JAVA_VER=8 ;;
    1.@(12|13|14|15|16.[0-4])*) JAVA_VER=11 ;;
    1.16.5) JAVA_VER=16 ;;
    1.@(17|18|19)*) JAVA_VER=17 ;;
    1.@(20|21|22|23)*) JAVA_VER=21 ;;
    *) JAVA_VER=17; echo "WARN: Unknown version $MINECRAFT_VERSION. Using Java 17." ;;
  esac

  JAVA_HOME="/opt/java/java$JAVA_VER"
  export JAVA_HOME
  export PATH="$JAVA_HOME/bin:$PATH"
  echo "Using Java $JAVA_VER from $JAVA_HOME"
  echo "$JAVA_VER" > "$SERVER_DIR/.javaver"
  java -version || {
    echo "Java failed to start. Ensure the version exists in the image."
    exit 1
  }
}

DOWNLOAD_MOD() {
  local PROJECT_ID="$1"
  local FILE_ID="$2"
  local MOD_FILE="$SERVER_DIR/mods/${FILE_ID}.jar"
  if [[ -f "$MOD_FILE" ]]; then
    echo "CACHED: $FILE_ID"
    return
  fi
  local DOWNLOAD_URL
  DOWNLOAD_URL=$(curl -sSL -H "x-api-key: $API_KEY" \
    "https://api.curseforge.com/v1/mods/${PROJECT_ID}/files/${FILE_ID}/download-url" \
    | jq -r '.data')
  curl -sSL "$DOWNLOAD_URL" -o "$MOD_FILE" && echo "DOWNLOADED: $FILE_ID" || echo "FAIL: $FILE_ID"
}

JSON_DOWNLOAD_MODS() {
  echo "DOWNLOADING MODS..."
  mkdir -p "$SERVER_DIR/mods"
  while read -r PROJECT FILE; do
    DOWNLOAD_MOD "$PROJECT" "$FILE" &
    while (( $(jobs -r | wc -l) >= MOD_DOWNLOAD_THREADS )); do
      wait -n
    done
  done < <(
    jq -r '.files[] | select(.required) | "\(.projectID) \(.fileID)"' "$SERVER_DIR/manifest.json"
  )
  wait
}

DOWNLOAD_INSTALLER() {
  local INSTALLER_PATH="$SERVER_DIR/$2"
  curl -fsSL -A "Mozilla/5.0" "$1" -o "$INSTALLER_PATH" || {
    echo "Failed to download $2"
    exit 1
  }
  java -jar "$INSTALLER_PATH" ${3:-} || {
    echo "Failed to run $2"
    exit 1
  }
  rm -f "$INSTALLER_PATH"
}

JSON_DOWNLOAD_LOADER() {
  echo "INSTALLING ${LOADER_NAME^^}..."
  case "$LOADER_NAME" in
    forge)
      VERSION_STRING="${MINECRAFT_VERSION}-${LOADER_VERSION}"
      if [[ "$MINECRAFT_VERSION" =~ 1\.(7\.10|8\.9) ]]; then
        VERSION_STRING="${VERSION_STRING}-${MINECRAFT_VERSION}"
      fi
      DOWNLOAD_INSTALLER \
        "https://maven.minecraftforge.net/net/minecraftforge/forge/${VERSION_STRING}/forge-${VERSION_STRING}-installer.jar" \
        forge-installer.jar "--installServer"
      LOADER_PATTERN="*forge-${VERSION_STRING}*.jar"
      ;;
    neoforge)
      ALIAS="neoforge"
      if [[ "$LOADER_VERSION" =~ 1.@(20|21|22|23).1- ]]; then
        ALIAS="forge"
      fi
      DOWNLOAD_INSTALLER \
        "https://maven.neoforged.net/releases/net/neoforged/${ALIAS}/${LOADER_VERSION}/${ALIAS}-${LOADER_VERSION}-installer.jar" \
        neoforge-installer.jar "--installServer"
      LOADER_PATTERN="*${ALIAS}-${LOADER_VERSION}*.jar"
      ;;
    fabric)
      DOWNLOAD_URL=$(curl -sSL https://meta.fabricmc.net/v2/versions/installer | jq -r '.[0].url')
      DOWNLOAD_INSTALLER "$DOWNLOAD_URL" fabric-installer.jar \
        "server -mcversion $MINECRAFT_VERSION -loader $LOADER_VERSION -downloadMinecraft"
      LOADER_PATTERN="*fabric*-server*.jar"
      ;;
    quilt)
      DOWNLOAD_URL=$(curl -sSL https://meta.quiltmc.org/v3/versions/installer | jq -r '.[0].url')
      DOWNLOAD_INSTALLER "$DOWNLOAD_URL" quilt-installer.jar \
        "install server $MINECRAFT_VERSION $LOADER_VERSION --download-server --install-dir=$SERVER_DIR"
      LOADER_PATTERN="*quilt*-server*.jar"
      ;;
    *)
      echo "UNKNOWN LOADER: $LOADER_NAME"
      exit 1
      ;;
  esac

  UNIX_SRC=$(find "$SERVER_DIR" -type f -iname "unix_args.txt"       | head -n1)
  USER_SRC=$(find "$SERVER_DIR" -type f -iname "user_jvm_args.txt"   | head -n1)

  if [[ -n "$UNIX_SRC" || -n "$USER_SRC" ]]; then
    echo "Found JVM-args file(s):"
    STARTUP_CMD="java"
    
    if [[ -n "$UNIX_SRC" ]]; then
      echo "  â†’ $UNIX_SRC"
      UNIX_RUNTIME="${UNIX_SRC/#\/mnt\/server/\/home\/container}"
      STARTUP_CMD+=" @${UNIX_RUNTIME}"
    fi

    if [[ -n "$USER_SRC" ]]; then
      echo "  â†’ $USER_SRC"
      USER_RUNTIME="${USER_SRC/#\/mnt\/server/\/home\/container}"
      STARTUP_CMD+=" @${USER_RUNTIME}"
    fi

    STARTUP_CMD+=" nogui"

    echo "$STARTUP_CMD" > "$SERVER_DIR/.startup"
    return
  fi

  echo "Looking for loader jar matching pattern: $LOADER_PATTERN"
  LOADER_JAR=$(find "$SERVER_DIR" -type f -iname "$LOADER_PATTERN" ! -iname "*installer*" | head -n1)
  if [[ -n "$LOADER_JAR" ]]; then
    echo "Using loader jar at $LOADER_JAR; translating path for runtime."
    RUNTIME_JAR="${LOADER_JAR/#\/mnt\/server/\/home\/container}"
    echo "java -jar ${RUNTIME_JAR}" > "$SERVER_DIR/.startup"
  else
    echo "ERROR: Loader jar not found matching pattern $LOADER_PATTERN"
    exit 1
  fi
}

CLEANUP_TMP_FILES() {
  mkdir -p "$TMP"
  unzip -q "$SERVER_DIR/server.zip" -d "$TMP" || {
    echo "Failed to unzip server.zip"
    exit 1
  }
  shopt -s dotglob
  EXTRACTED_FILES=("$TMP"/*)
  if [[ ${#EXTRACTED_FILES[@]} -eq 0 ]]; then
    echo "No EXTRACTED_FILES extracted from server.zip"
    exit 1
  fi
  if [[ -d "${EXTRACTED_FILES[0]}" && ${#EXTRACTED_FILES[@]} -eq 1 ]]; then
    EXTRACTED_FILES=("${EXTRACTED_FILES[0]}"/*)
  fi
  cp -ar "${EXTRACTED_FILES[@]}" "$SERVER_DIR" || {
    echo "Failed to copy extracted EXTRACTED_FILES"
    exit 1
  }
  rm -rf "$TMP" "$SERVER_DIR/server.zip"
}

DOWNLOAD_CUSTOM_MODS() {
  [[ -z "${CUSTOM_MOD_URLS:-}" ]] && return
  IFS=',' read -ra URLS <<< "$CUSTOM_MOD_URLS"
  mkdir -p "$SERVER_DIR/mods"
  for url in "${URLS[@]}"; do
    echo "CUSTOM MOD: $url"
    curl -sSL -o "$SERVER_DIR/mods/$(basename "$DOWNLOAD_URL")" "$url" || \
      echo "FAILED TO DOWNLOAD $url"
  done
}

MAIN() {
  GET_MODPACK_ID
  GET_DOWNLOAD
  GET_LOADER
  GET_JAVA
  cd "$SERVER_DIR"
  CLEANUP_TMP_FILES

  [[ -f "$SERVER_DIR/manifest.json" ]] && JSON_DOWNLOAD_MODS
  [[ -d "$SERVER_DIR/overrides" ]] && cp -r "$SERVER_DIR/overrides/"* "$SERVER_DIR" && rm -r "$SERVER_DIR/overrides"
  [[ -f "$SERVER_DIR/client.manifest.json" ]] && JSON_DOWNLOAD_LOADER

  DOWNLOAD_CUSTOM_MODS
  echo "INSTALL COMPLETE."
}

MAIN "$@"
